title: perm ban
body: So my account has been perm banned for a couple months now, I would like to know what the reason for the perm ban is and if possible a way to appeal it.

replies.body:
You didn't get an e-mail explaining it?

Well, usually even if you missed that, you're given a brief synopsis of why you were banned when you first attempt to log in after being banned.

If you'd like to apply for an appeal, contact player support.

Remember, manners gets you places.

Best of luck.

I'm new to using the site, it's always been irrelevant till now.
How do I contact player support?
